history.title: History
history.highlightText: Established in the late 1960s, our family owned business is based in Edinburgh and Falkirk, but services customers across the UK.
paragraphs: Our Edinburgh branch has the longest history as an audio retailer in the UK. During recent years, the staff have been joined by experienced personnel directly from the business back to 1926. In the 1950s WG Graham took over the shop and renamed it WG Graham's HiFi Corner. Upon his retirement, Graham Trio bought the business and modernized the name to HiFi Horizon.

Soon thereafter a young enthusiastic Colin MacKenzie (left), who was recommended by Linn's own Ivor Tiefenbrun, was employed to manage the shop, with a knack for business and the desire to succeed. By 1980 Colin MacKenzie had become the owner of HiFi Horizon. Today, Struan MacKenzie carries on the legacy as the company's Managing Director.

hearDifference.title: Hear The Difference
hearDifference.highlightText: Book a demonstration at our Edinburgh or Falkirk showrooms.

paragraphs.text: Would you choose a quality car without a test drive? If you are familiar with the brand and have great trust in it, you might. However, our listening preferences are unique to the individual and with many of our customers new to the world of high quality sound and vision, we encourage everyone to come in to demonstrate the products before making any decisions. Demonstrations are available by appointment in both our Edinburgh and Falkirk premises where you can decide for yourself if the kit is right for you. We also offer home demonstrations on selected products.
It's our aim to get the right product for you.
Our experts are on hand to guide you through the differences between speakers, amplifiers and sources and provide simple solutions that suit your needs.

services.title: Services
services.highlightText: Our passion for the products we sell and, for our customers' satisfaction simply means that we happily offer additional services not found on the high-street.

serviceList.name: Home Setup
serviceList.description: We want to ensure that the equipment you've purchased from us is installed correctly and sounds perfect, and we happily provide this service throughout the UK.

serviceList.name: Part Exchange
serviceList.description: To help you upgrade your system, we offer our part-exchange program. We can offer a set price, or sell your old kit on your behalf.

serviceList.name: Turntable Doctor
serviceList.description: Our turntable experts have been trained by the manufacturers for initial setup, long-term maintenance, and upgrading your high quality turntables.

serviceList.name: Record Cleaning Service
serviceList.description: Have some old records that need a bit of love? We offer Scotland's very own professional record cleaning service with our bespoke Pro-Ject record cleaner.

tailored.title: Tailored For You
tailored.highlightText: We look forward to customising a system to meet your needs.
paragraphs: We don't favour one manufacturer over another – the only thing we do favour is making sure our customers get the right product that suits their needs and listening preferences. We will ask many questions in order to ensure that what you buy from us is tailored to you and you alone.
If you are looking for a product not found in our demonstration showrooms or our online site, don't fret as we have access to hundreds of brands.
One of our biggest pleasures of working in this industry is to see the smile on our customers' faces when they finally hear and see the system of their dreams.

products.name: Auralic Aries G2.1 Streamer
products.subtitle: (Digital Output)
products.description: G2.1 is the next logical evolutionary step, resulting from a desire to improve upon the original G2 series. At AURALIC, we always work to create a new approach to digital music that pushes the boundaries of sonic quality, incorporating state-of-the-art technologies and delivered with an innovative features.

products.name: Cambridge Audio CXN V2
products.subtitle: (Network Streamer)
products.description: The CXN V2 is a premium network streamer that delivers high-quality digital audio streaming with support for all major streaming services. Features advanced DAC technology and comprehensive connectivity options for the modern audiophile.

products.name: Bluesound Node X
products.subtitle: (Wireless Multi-Room Streamer)
products.description: The Node X is a versatile wireless multi-room music streamer that connects to any stereo system or powered speakers. Stream high-resolution music from popular services or your own music library with exceptional sound quality.

products.name: iFi Audio Zen Stream
products.subtitle: (Dedicated Network Transport)
products.description: The Zen Stream is a dedicated network transport designed for audiophiles who demand the highest quality digital audio streaming. Features advanced jitter reduction and multiple digital outputs for ultimate flexibility.

products.name: Marantz CD6007
products.subtitle: (Super Audio CD Player)
products.description: The CD6007 is a premium CD player that supports both standard CDs and Super Audio CDs. Features advanced DAC technology and precise digital filtering for exceptional sound quality from your disc collection.

products.name: Cambridge Audio CXC V2
products.subtitle: (CD Transport)
products.description: The CXC V2 is a dedicated CD transport designed to extract the maximum performance from your CD collection. Features precision engineering and advanced error correction for pristine digital audio output.

products.name: Denon DCD-1700NE
products.subtitle: (Super Audio CD Player)
products.description: The DCD-1700NE is a high-performance SACD player featuring advanced Lambda Super Linear Converter and AL32 Processing. Delivers exceptional sound quality from both CDs and SACDs with audiophile-grade components.

products.name: Yamaha CD-S1000
products.subtitle: (Natural Sound CD Player)
products.description: The CD-S1000 represents Yamaha's commitment to natural sound reproduction. Features high-quality components, advanced digital processing, and meticulous construction for audiophile-level CD playback.

products.name: Oppo UDP-205
products.subtitle: (Universal Disc Player)
products.description: The UDP-205 is a reference-quality universal disc player supporting 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray, Blu-ray, DVD, SACD, and CD formats. Features dual ES9038PRO DACs and comprehensive connectivity for the ultimate home theater experience.

products.name: Panasonic DP-UB9000
products.subtitle: (4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Player)
products.description: The DP-UB9000 is a flagship 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray player with advanced HDR processing and high-quality audio capabilities. Features premium construction and audiophile-grade components for exceptional performance.

products.name: Sony UBP-X800M2
products.subtitle: (4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Player)
products.description: The UBP-X800M2 offers excellent 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray playback with support for HDR formats and high-resolution audio. Features robust build quality and comprehensive format support at an accessible price point.

products.name: Cambridge Audio CXUHD
products.subtitle: (4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Player)
products.description: The CXUHD combines exceptional 4K Ultra HD video performance with audiophile-quality audio reproduction. Features dedicated audio and video processing for the ultimate home cinema experience.

products.name: Parasound Halo A23+
products.subtitle: (Stereo Power Amplifier)
products.description: The Halo A23+ is a high-performance stereo power amplifier delivering 160 watts per channel into 8 ohms. Features John Curl's acclaimed circuit design with premium components for exceptional musical reproduction.

products.name: Rotel RB-1590
products.subtitle: (2-Channel Power Amplifier)
products.description: The RB-1590 is a flagship stereo power amplifier delivering 350 watts per channel. Features massive toroidal transformer, high-current output devices, and premium construction for reference-level performance.

products.name: Cambridge Audio CXA81
products.subtitle: (Integrated Amplifier)
products.description: The CXA81 is a versatile integrated amplifier with built-in DAC and comprehensive connectivity. Delivers 80 watts per channel with exceptional sound quality and modern convenience features.

products.name: NAD C268
products.subtitle: (Stereo Power Amplifier)
products.description: The C268 is a compact stereo power amplifier featuring NAD's advanced Hypex technology. Delivers 80 watts per channel with exceptional efficiency and sound quality in a sleek, modern design.

products.name: Marantz PM-10
products.subtitle: (Reference Preamplifier)
products.description: The PM-10 is Marantz's flagship reference preamplifier featuring proprietary HDAM-SA3 modules and premium components. Delivers uncompromising sound quality with comprehensive connectivity and control options.

products.name: Audio Research LS28
products.subtitle: (Vacuum Tube Preamplifier)
products.description: The LS28 is a high-performance vacuum tube preamplifier featuring 6H30 tubes and advanced circuit topology. Delivers the warmth and musicality of tubes with modern reliability and convenience.

products.name: Parasound Halo P6
products.subtitle: (2-Channel Preamplifier)
products.description: The Halo P6 is a sophisticated stereo preamplifier with built-in DAC and comprehensive digital/analog inputs. Features John Curl's circuit design with premium components for exceptional performance.

products.name: Cambridge Audio CXC V2
products.subtitle: (CD Transport/Preamplifier)
products.description: The CXC V2 combines a precision CD transport with a high-quality preamplifier section. Features comprehensive connectivity and exceptional build quality for versatile system integration.

products.name: Auralic Aries G2.1 Streamer
products.subtitle: (Digital Output)
products.description: The LS50 Meta represents the evolution of KEF's acclaimed LS50 design, featuring breakthrough Metamaterial Absorption Technology. Delivers exceptionally detailed and natural sound with improved clarity and reduced distortion.

products.name: B&W 805 D4
products.subtitle: (Standmount Speakers)
products.description: The 805 D4 combines advanced diamond tweeter technology with continuum cone midrange driver. Delivers reference-quality sound reproduction with exceptional detail, dynamics, and musicality.

products.name: Monitor Audio Silver 100 7G
products.subtitle: (Bookshelf Speakers)
products.description: The Silver 100 7G features advanced C-CAM technology and refined crossover design. Delivers exceptional clarity and musical engagement with modern styling and premium build quality.

products.name: ELAC Debut Reference DBR62
products.subtitle: (Bookshelf Speakers)
products.description: The DBR62 represents exceptional value in high-performance bookshelf speakers. Features advanced driver technology and precision engineering for audiophile sound quality at an accessible price.

products.name: Focal Aria 906
products.subtitle: (Bookshelf Speakers)
products.description: The Aria 906 features Focal's signature inverted dome tweeter and flax cone woofer technology. Delivers the distinctive French sound with exceptional detail, dynamics, and musical expression.

products.name: Marantz PM8006
products.subtitle: (Integrated Amplifier)
products.description: The PM8006 is a premium integrated amplifier featuring Marantz's musical sound signature. Delivers 70 watts per channel with exceptional build quality and comprehensive connectivity options.

products.name: Cambridge Audio CXA81
products.subtitle: (Integrated Amplifier)
products.description: The CXA81 combines powerful amplification with advanced DAC technology. Features 80 watts per channel, comprehensive digital inputs, and modern connectivity for today's audio systems.

products.name: Rega Brio
products.subtitle: (Integrated Amplifier)
products.description: The Brio is a minimalist integrated amplifier focusing on musical performance. Features 50 watts per channel with Rega's signature sound quality and elegant British design.

products.name: NAD C3050 LE
products.subtitle: (Integrated Amplifier)
products.description: The C3050 LE is a sophisticated integrated amplifier with advanced digital capabilities. Features 100 watts per channel, comprehensive streaming, and NAD's renowned PowerDrive technology.

products.name: Yamaha A-S1200
products.subtitle: (Integrated Amplifier)
products.description: The A-S1200 is a flagship integrated amplifier featuring pure direct mode and premium components. Delivers 90 watts per channel with exceptional build quality and Yamaha's natural sound philosophy.

products.name: Rega Planar 3
products.subtitle: (Turntable with Elys 2 Cartridge)
products.description: The Planar 3 is a precision-engineered turntable featuring the RB330 tonearm and Elys 2 cartridge. Delivers exceptional analog sound quality with legendary Rega build quality and musical performance.

products.name: Pro-Ject Debut Carbon EVO
products.subtitle: (Turntable with Sumiko Rainier)
products.description: The Debut Carbon EVO features a carbon fiber tonearm and Sumiko Rainier cartridge. Offers exceptional value with precision engineering and audiophile performance at an accessible price point.

products.name: Technics SL-1500C
products.subtitle: (Direct Drive Turntable)
products.description: The SL-1500C features Technics' legendary direct drive technology with modern refinements. Includes Ortofon Red cartridge and delivers exceptional speed stability and musical performance.

products.name: VPI Prime Scout
products.subtitle: (Belt Drive Turntable)
products.description: The Prime Scout is a high-performance belt drive turntable featuring VPI's acclaimed engineering. Delivers exceptional analog reproduction with premium materials and meticulous construction.

products.name: Clearaudio Concept
products.subtitle: (Turntable with Verify Tonearm)
products.description: The Concept features German precision engineering with magnetic bearing technology. Includes Verify tonearm and Concept MM cartridge for exceptional tracking and musical reproduction.

products.name: Audio Research VSi60
products.subtitle: (Vacuum Tube Integrated Amplifier)
products.description: The VSi60 is a premium tube integrated amplifier featuring KT120 output tubes. Delivers 50 watts per channel with the warmth and musicality that defines the Audio Research sound signature.

products.name: Prima Luna EVO 400 Integrated
products.subtitle: (Tube Integrated Amplifier)
products.description: The EVO 400 features adaptive auto bias and premium EL34 tubes. Delivers exceptional tube sound with modern reliability and comprehensive protection circuitry for worry-free operation.

products.name: Rogue Audio Cronus Magnum III
products.subtitle: (Tube Integrated Amplifier)
products.description: The Cronus Magnum III is a versatile tube integrated featuring KT120 tubes and comprehensive connectivity. Offers exceptional value with premium tube sound and modern convenience features.

products.name: Cayin A-88T MK2
products.subtitle: (Tube Integrated Amplifier)
products.description: The A-88T MK2 features EL34 push-pull design with premium transformers. Delivers 35 watts per channel with classic tube warmth and exceptional build quality from this respected Chinese manufacturer.

products.name: Unison Research Sinfonia
products.subtitle: (Tube Integrated Amplifier)
products.description: The Sinfonia is a premium Italian tube amplifier featuring EL34 pentode/triode switching. Delivers 35 watts per channel with exquisite Italian craftsmanship and exceptional musical expression.
